# Condemnation (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One outsider

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 107

*You speak words of power, forcing the entity to shrink with horror.*

The outsider targeted by this spell must succeed on a Will save or be [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round and have its spell resistance reduced by 10.
